metadata.title: CVE-2006-2447

platform: SUSE CORE 9 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T
SUSE CORE 9 for Itanium Processor Family

metadata.description: SpamAssassin before 3.1.3, when running with vpopmail and the paranoid (-P) switch, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a crafted message that is not properly handled when invoking spamd with the virtual pop username.
